name: Sunrise (itch) (marcan)
description:
Sunrise is a game made during the Potat0s-Jam #10

You can play with a keyboard or a Xbox Gamepad (only tested with a Xbox 360 gamepad).

Credits
  • Code, graphics, audio: Marcan
  • Musics:
    • Sycamore Drive - Happiness
    • Sycamore Drive - Ocean Breeze
    • Sycamore Drive - Slumber
